Title: iNet Class Library
Description: Generic .NET class library which contains Tasking, Windows Portable Devices (WPD) wrapper, Image codec, Metadata access, Video codec, ... etc.
HomeWiki:
iNet Class Library is generic .NET class library which consist of :
  • iNet
    • Win32 API.
    • Tasking.
  • iNet.IO.PortableDevices
    • Windows Portable Device (WPD) interface for .NET.
  • iNet.Media
    • Image codec.
    • EXIF metadata.
    • XMP metadata.
    • Image format conversion.
  • iNet.Media.Audio
  • iNet.Media.Imaging.Filters
  • iNet.Media.Video
    • Video codec.
    • Video transcoding.
  • iNet.Windows
    • Extensions for WPF DependencyObject/UIElement/FrameworkElement, etc.
Dependencies :
  • dcraw
  • FFmpeg
  • FreeImage
  • NLog
  • nVLC
  • VLC media player

iNet Class Library is currently used by FotoAlbum.
